content: this is a summary of a legal case in croatia involving a coownership property specifically a residential building the property is located in a municipality called t and consists of a 2936 square meter apartment on the sixth floor the property was registered under subregister 1677 the case went through a civil partition and judicial public sale process resulting in the property being sold and the sale value being divided among the parties based on their coownership shares the applicant i t received a 16 share while the counterparty m t received a 56 share the decision in this case was based on several laws including article 50 and 51 of the property act as well as article 8 of the act on judicial procedure
